ml.alternet.parser

Class Grammar.DropToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.Rule
      • ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.Token
        • ml.alternet.parser.Grammar.DropToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Presentable, Unwrappable<Grammar.Rule>, ComposedRule<Grammar.Rule>, TraversableRule, TraversableRule.SimpleRule
    Enclosing interface:
    Grammar

    public static class Grammar.DropToken
extends Grammar.Token
implements TraversableRule.SimpleRule, Unwrappable<Grammar.Rule>
    A token not transmitted to the event handler while parsing.
    Author:
    Philippe Poulard
    See Also:
    EventsHandler.receive(TokenValue)
